colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017A *, ,CES YUM CHEN MO DANG MKHA' 'GRO SDE LNGA'I BSNYEN PA BYED TSUL MA GCIG MKHA' 'GRO'I ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPAL LDAN STOD RGYUD GRVA TSANG GI GRVA RIGS DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DRI MED KYIS YANG YANG DU BSKUL ZHING, GANGS RI CHEN PO TE SE'I SGRUB GNAS BON RI'I BLA MA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN @017B GYI KYANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MA CIG LABS KYI SGRON MA'I GSUNG DANG, ,'DUL 'DZIN BLO GROS SBAS PAS MDZAD PA'I GCOD GZHUNG PHUL BYUNG GSER PHRENG DANG, RJE SMON LAM MTHA' YAS MDZAD PA'I GCOG GZHUNG RNAMS LA ZHIB TU BRTAGS SHING, DPAL DBEN SA SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG GIS BRGYAN TE BKRA SHIS BSTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'PHAL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,BKRA SHIS DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,
